alert.note: Alert for Aiken (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Aiken County through 515 PM EDT... At 432 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over USC Aiken, or over Aiken. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, Aiken Mall, Citizens Park, Aiken Municipal Airport, Gloverville, USC Aiken, Graniteville, Burnettown, Hopeland Gardens and Vaucluse. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 8 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
